history.text: Hi how are you? I think this movie "Bruce Almighty" sounds like an interesting movie. Do you like Jim Carrey?
HI
I am not familiar with Bruce Almighty. Can you tell me more about it?
I do love Jim Carrey though.
Sure.It was about this unhappy TV reporter who complains to God
That sounds like it would be entertaining.
Eventually he gets to play God for one week. The reporter is played by Jim Carrey and God by Morgan Freeman
Do you know what year it came out? Im not sure how I missed it.
It was over a decade ago. 2003. It has an okay score on Rotten Tomatoes
I love Morgan Freeman too! He is such a good actor. Playing God sounds fun!
haha yes I think he would fit in very well in his role right?
Wow that has been out for a long time. I guess I need to look it up.
What is Rotten Tomatoes?
It is a movie aggregate ratings site. Anyways, Bruce Nolan (Jim Carrey) has a complicated life. He is in a relationship with a girl played by Jennifer Aniston yet he has a crush on his co-worker.
Yes actually Jim Carrey and Morgan Freeman both have strong personalities so I can picture them both playing God. I think one would be very serious and the other would be a comical God though. haha
Oh I really like Jennifer Aniston too. I can't imagine why he would be interested in someone else besides her.
Oh yes. My thoughts so too. You know Steve Carell is in the movie. He is sort of Bruce's "rival"
Do you mean Stever Carell from The Office?
I don't know. This document doesn't say anything about The Office.
If so I love him too. He cracks me up. I really enjoy his movies.
Oh okay well if it is who I think it is then that is him.
Jim Carrey and Steve Carell who be funny rivals against each other I think.
This movie is sounding better and better all the time.
Well in the movie Bruce is now God and he wants to change his life. He wants to become the anchor at his news station by reporting a miraculous event.
Oh I see. Why does he want to change his life?
But on the other hand, God has responsibilities such as responding to people's prayers.
As I told you earlier, he was unhappy with his life. His rival (Steve Carrell) had a promotion. He had a crush on his co-worker, etc.
Well I'm sure God is very busy if he is listening and answering everybody's prayers all the time.
So what kind of miraculous event does he want to occur?

I can see why they would be rivals at work. Do they both like the sam
e girl too?
(slow down) A meteor striking the earth and he was the first reporter there to report it. etc.
But at the end of the day, Bruce encounters God and Bruce tells God he wants his girlfriend to be happy
Oh wow does the meteor actually strike earth or does he stop it from happening?
He tells God that he just wants his girlfriend to be happy. He prays to him
Does it explain why his girlfriend is unhappy?
Nono. That probably means inside he is a human although he likes to play God
So he prays to God even though he is God?
Yes. He became God temporarily and he still is a human
I think you will like this movie a lot
Be sure to check it out!
Okay I see. Well it sounds like I need to go rent the movie or see if I can find it on Netflix so I can find out the rest of the details for myself.
It was nice talking to you. Good bye
I definitely will.. Good bye

uid1response.feedback: The documents weren't so coherent. The pieces just didn't add up well.

uid2response.feedback: I never saw the document. The other user gave me a good understanding of what the document said about the movie. He explained what the movies was about and who starred in it well I definitely want to rent it now or find it on Netflix to watch so I can see it all in action because it sounds like it is a funny good movie.
